00033 class TileRender {
00034   public:
00035     TileRender( int32_t imageWidth, int32_t imageHeight, int32_t tileWidth = 512, int32_t tileHeight = 512 );
00036     
00037     bool        nextTile();
00038     
00039     int32_t     getImageWidth() const { return mImageWidth; }
00040     int32_t     getImageHeight() const { return mImageHeight; }
00041     float       getImageAspectRatio() const { return mImageWidth / (float)mImageHeight; }
00042     Area        getCurrentTileArea() const { return mCurrentArea; }
00043     Surface     getSurface() const { return mSurface; }
00044

00046     void        setMatrices( const Camera &camera );
00047 
00048     void        frustum( float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float nearPlane, float farPlane );
00049     void        ortho( float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float nearPlane, float farPlane );
00050     
00051   protected:
00052     void        updateFrustum();
00053

00055     int32_t     mTileWidth, mTileHeight;
00056     int32_t     mNumTilesX, mNumTilesY;
00057

00059     Area        mCurrentArea;
00060     Rectf       mCurrentFrustumCoords;

00063

00065     Surface     mSurface;
